Name: LSU Digital Art Website and Social Media Maintenance
Description: Ongoing maintenance of LSU Digital Art online presence including website and social media platforms for student and faculty recruitment. Platforms include Instagram (@lsudigitalart), official program website, Facebook group, Vimeo channel, and Tumblr blog.

Name: Prospective Student Tours and School Group Visits
Description: Ongoing tours for prospective undergraduate and graduate students, as well as school groups interested in the Digital Art program.

Name: Digital Art BFA and MFA Selective Admissions Oversight
Description: Ongoing oversight of selective admissions process for Digital Art BFA and MFA programs, reviewing applications and portfolios.

Name: St. Joseph Academy Student Mentor
Description: Mentoring program for students from St. Joseph Academy, providing guidance on digital arts education and career paths.

Name: LSU College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day - Digital Media at LSU
Description: Presenter at LSU College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day, showcasing Digital Media programs and opportunities at LSU.

Name: CampQuest Tour
Description: Presenter for CampQuest tour, introducing participants to digital art and media programs.

Name: LSU School of Art Open House - Digital Art
Description: Digital Art presenter at LSU School of Art Open House, showcasing program offerings to prospective students.

Name: LSU College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day - Digital Media at LSU
Description: Presenter at LSU College of Art & Design Accepted Student Preview Day, showcasing Digital Media programs and opportunities at LSU.

Name: LSU Digital Art Catalog Development
Description: Developed content and collaborated on design with SoA Graphic Design Student Office for LSU Digital Art Catalog recruitment materials.

Name: Broadmoor High School Digital Media Tour
Description: Organizer for Broadmoor High School Digital Media Tour at LSU School of Art & Center for Computation & Technology.

Name: Patrick Taylor High School Digital Media Tour
Description: Presenter for Patrick Taylor High School Digital Media Tour at LSU Center for Computation & Technology.

Name: Digital Art Showcase - LSU Tailgating with the Dean
Description: Organizer for Digital Art Showcase at LSU Tailgating with the Dean event in Baton Rouge, LA, promoting the digital art program.

Name: LSU Digital Art Website Original Content
Description: Wrote original copy for the LSU Digital Art Website to enhance recruitment and program visibility.

Name: Digital Art Student Work Showcase Website
Description: Developed a dedicated website to showcase Digital Art Student Work, enhancing program visibility and recruitment efforts.
